item.title: Tyler Explains... Continuous Delivery
item.description: If there’s a buzzword more popularized and misunderstood than Agility or DevOps, it’s probably Continuous Delivery. As with many complex ideas, it’s difficult to understand at a glance, easy to make guesses about, and takes awhile before misconceptions become evident. My hope is that this post will allow some people to get a better understanding before vaulting into the unknown.

item.title: Home
item.description: Hi, I'm Tyler Evert I'm a software engineer in southeast Wisconsin. My main area of interest is in the field of DevOps, and helping companies hit a higher-performing state. I also love to travel, and spend most weekends gaming with friends. Feel free to reach out on any medium above if you want to talk about technology, travel, or anything else! What is a "foxgang"? "Foxgang" is a name I coined when I was 6 years old and decided I didn't like "

item.title: Tyler Explains... Serverless Architecture
item.description: Why Am I Explaining Things? In my experience from company to company, I’ve found significant numbers of people (developers up to mid-level managers) who haven’t had the time in their careers to follow the riot of new ideas, terms, and principles in the software world. I’m starting a chain of posts as a glossary of sorts, to clear the air on some of these topics that I think are important.
